mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT MENU.MENU_NO, MENU.MENU_NAME, MENU.BRAND, MENU.CAFFEINE, MENU.MENU_SIZE, MENU.IMAGE_URL FROM DRINK JOIN MENU ON DRINK.MENU_NO = MENU.MENU_NO WHERE MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} AND REQ_DATE <= #{today} ORDER BY (SELECT DRINK_NO FROM DRINK WHERE DRINK.MENU_NO = MENU.MENU_NO ORDER BY DRINK_NO DESC LIMIT 1) DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT SUM_TABLE.SUM_CAFFEINE AS CAFFEINE, CASE WHEN SUM_TABLE.SUM_CAFFEINE IS NULL THEN '없음' WHEN SUM_TABLE.SUM_CAFFEINE < #{minNormal} THEN '낮음' WHEN SUM_TABLE.SUM_CAFFEINE > #{maxNormal} THEN '높음' ELSE '보통' END AS STATUS FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(MENU.CAFFEINE, 1, LENGTH(MENU.CAFFEINE) - 2) AS UNSIGNED)), NULL) AS SUM_CAFFEINE FROM DRINK JOIN MENU ON DRINK.MENU_NO = MENU.MENU_NO WHERE MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} AND REQ_DATE = #{localDateTime} ) AS SUM_TABLE

SELECT MENU.MENU_NO, MENU.MENU_NAME, MENU.BRAND, MENU.CAFFEINE, MENU.MENU_SIZE, MENU.IMAGE_URL FROM DRINK JOIN MENU ON DRINK.MENU_NO = MENU.MENU_NO WHERE MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} AND REQ_DATE = #{localDateTime}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DRINK(MBR_NO, MENU_NO, REQ_DATE) VALUES (#{mbrNo}, #{menuNo}, #{localDateTime})
